questions.text: The secondary attack rate of measles is more than mumps. What is the conclusion?

options.label: A
options.text: Measles is more dangerous than mumps

options.label: B
options.text: Mumps is more dangerous than measles

options.label: C
options.text: Measles is more infectious than mumps

options.label: D
options.text: Measles is more common than mumps

questions.correct_answer: C. Measles is more infectious than mumps

questions.text: Which of the following statement incubation period (IP) is not correct?
